Hello there! I´m Richard Amakye, and welcome to my portfolio website

Biography

Born in a family of four, I have always been the person who sees every to take every opportunity as a chance to thrive and excel with the limited resources in my possesion, beginning my education in Cosmos Basic School,located at Lapaz, progessing to read Business in Apam Senior High School in the Central Region

I am currently graduating from the University Of Professional Studies with a degree in Information Technology I am a hard-working, honest individual. I am a good timekeeper, always willing to learn new skills. I can work independently in busy environments and also within a team setting. I am a very outgoing individual, and able to listen effectively when solving problems.

I am a well-organized person, effective and professional person who is always curious to learn about new tools and technologies and can easily adapt to ever- changing situations to achieve desired business results

I am a backend developer with knowledge in Php, Lavarel, Javascript and Node. I also build front-end Applications using HTML, CSS ,React, React Native and also comfortable using Git

Aside, being a software developer I find very keen interest in agriculture, for that matter i Co-foundered a company called UrbanGreen Farms Ghana which deals with the exportation of fresh and organic kiett and kent mangoes. And also the Co-Founder of Daffy Juice among other little start ups
